Class Deck

java.lang.Object
model.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of cards used in the Blackjack game. The deck can be shuffled, have cards drawn from it, and be reloaded from a discard pile.
Version:
1.0.0.
Author:
ptrzgal

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Deck.EmptyDeckException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to draw a card from an empty deck.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructs an empty deck of cards.

    • Deck

      public Deck(boolean ifMakeDeck)
      Constructs a deck of cards with all possible suits and ranks.
      Parameters:
      ifMakeDeck - determines whether to populate the deck with cards. If true, the deck is populated with all combinations of suits and ranks.

  • Method Details

    • addCards

      public void addCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Adds a list of cards to the deck.
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of cards to add to the deck

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards in the deck using a randomizer.

    • takeCard

      public Card takeCard() throws Deck.EmptyDeckException
      Takes the top card from the deck and removes it.
      Returns:
      the card taken from the deck
      Throws:
      Deck.EmptyDeckException - if the deck is empty and no card can be drawn

    • hasCards

      public boolean hasCards()
      Checks if there are any cards left in the deck.
      Returns:
      true if there are cards left in the deck, false otherwise

    • emptyDeck

      public void emptyDeck()
      Clears the deck, removing all cards.

    • reloadDeckFromDiscard

      public void reloadDeckFromDiscard(Deck discard)
      Reloads the deck from the discard pile and shuffles the cards.
      Parameters:
      discard - the deck representing the discard pile

    • cardsLeft

      public int cardsLeft()
      Returns the number of cards left in the deck.
      Returns:
      the number of remaining cards in the deck
